data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: It is necessary for people to commemorate major events in the country's history as they can learn a lot from those past events including both victory and loss, success and tragedy. The connection between past, present, and future can allow people to remember and apply history to their daily lives. Seeing the government officials and local leaders actively participating in ceremonies will set an example for patriotism. And doing projects in memory of those major events will help citizens develop a society that is conscious of what is at stake when some do not respect the rights of others to exist. The truth is that in order to ensure that history has a continual impact on people's actions and decision-making processes, people can never allow the past to be laid to rest. (133字)
data.referenceText: In what ways can people commemorate major events in the country's history?
data.referenceTranslate: 人们可以用什么方式来纪念国家历史上的重大事件?
